title: '"Creating graphs in R with `ggplot2`"'
author: '"Alfie"'
date: "2023-03-12"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r}
ca_na <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors)) +
  geom_line()
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors))
gg_base +
geom_point()
gg_base +
geom_col()
gg_base +
geom_area()
gg_base +
geom_line(
color = "purple",
linetype = "dashed"
)
gg_base +
geom_point(
color = "purple",
pch = 17,
size = 4,
alpha = 0.5)
?pch
gg_base +
geom_point(
aes(size = visitors,
color = visitors),
alpha = 0.5)

gg_base +
  geom_col(aes(fill = visitors))
```
